hero_title: Where creatives connect, collaborate, and thrive.
hero_subtitle: SpheraConnect brings artists, buyers, and curators together with AI-matched opportunities, real-time collaboration, and a global marketplace.
footer_copy: Copyright {year} SpheraConnect. Crafted for creative collaborations.
generic_drag_drop: Drag & drop or click to upload
auth_login_subheading: Pick up your collaborations where you left off. Manage conversations, share new drops, and stay visible on the hub map.
auth_login_stat_connections_caption: Creative connections made between artists and buyers.
auth_login_stat_events_caption: Live events curated for SpheraConnect members this month.
auth_login_card_description: Secure login with email or your preferred provider.
auth_signup_description: Step into a community built for multi-disciplinary creatives.
auth_signup_success: Account created! Jump into your profile setup.
auth_signup_highlight_onboarding_body: Import your portfolio, tag your disciplines, and request verification for curated exposure.
auth_signup_highlight_ai_body: Reach producers, curators, and buyers who align with your mediums and interests.
auth_signup_highlight_hubs_body: Check into creative hubs, book studio slots, and stay visible to local collaborators.
hub_subtitle: Explore active hubs and see who is currently checked in. Toggle visibility at any time.
hub_live_creatives_description: Check-ins expire after 4 hours to keep presence data accurate. Encourage your collaborators to opt in for visibility.
hub_recent_activity_empty: No check-ins yet. Encourage your collaborators to share their presence to appear on the map.
map_missing_token: Configure NEXT_PUBLIC_MAPBOX_TOKEN to render the hub map.
marketplace_seller_tip_one: Upload multiple angles for immersive 3D or mixed-media pieces.
marketplace_seller_tip_two: Enable custom commissions to unlock higher-value collaborations.
marketplace_seller_tip_three: Use tags for mediums and moods so AI matching surfaces your work.
marketplace_subheading: Discover artworks, installations, and custom services from the community.
marketplace_empty: No artworks match this filter yet. Try widening your price range or exploring another tag.
marketplace_dashboard_empty: You do not have any listings yet. Create one to showcase your work.
messages_auth_required: Sign in to explore the collaborative messaging workspace.
messages_empty: Select a thread to get started.
filedrop_prompt: Drag & drop or click to upload
rewards_subtitle: Engagement points accrue from onboarding, check-ins, matches, sales, and RSVPs.
events_subtitle: RSVP to upcoming labs, roundtables, and showcases. Event scaffolding includes moderated submissions and host dashboards.
events_planner_hint: Share a location or virtual link so attendees know where to meet.
events_form_start_error: Add a start time before saving.
events_alert_error: Unable to update events right now.
events_none_upcoming: No upcoming events yet. Use the admin panel to schedule the next drop.
careers_subtitle: Career pathways are integrated with the marketplace roadmap. This scaffold reserves the route for curated placements, studio residencies, and partner briefs.
careers_coming_soon: Coming soon: filterable roles, AI-powered brief pairing, and application tracking dashboards.
matcher_subtitle: Swipe through curated collaborators based on skills, shared tags, and proximity.
matcher_sign_in_prompt: Sign in to test the matching flow.
matcher_swipe_hint: Swipe right to connect and left to skip. Creatives in your current hub surface first.
matcher_no_more: No more creatives nearby. Try refreshing to explore other hubs.
create_profile_skills_placeholder: Add up to 25 skills separated by commas
profiles_subtitle: Search by discipline, language, or skill to find your next collaborator.
profiles_filter_placeholder: Search by name, skill, or keyword
profiles_error: Unable to load profiles right now.
profiles_empty: No profiles match your filters yet.
profile_empty_portfolio: No artworks yet. Upload pieces from the marketplace dashboard to showcase them here.
profile_not_found: This profile is no longer available.
profile_error_message: Something went wrong while loading the profile. Please try again.
profile_login_required: Sign in to view your profile.
